name: Enhanced Image Package File
summary: Learn about .EIP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: EIP files are used for transferring digital photos to another computer while preserving all capture and editing information.
NOTE: To create an EIP file in Capture One, choose File → Pack as EIP from the program's menu. (In newer versions, instead select Image → Pack as EIP).

instructions: You can open an EIP file in Phase One Capture One (Windows, Mac). To do so, open the program and select File → Unpack EIP. (In newer versions of Capture One, instead select Image → Unpack EIP.)
If you do not have access to Capture One, you can also open an EIP file as you would a .ZIP file. You may have to change the file's extension to .zip in order to open it as a ZIP file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
